bill.title: Small Boat Harbors; Commercial Vessels; Development
bill.description: Permits commercial permits in Ala Wai and Keehi small boat harbors. Authorizes a process for a public-private partnership to develop a portion of Ala Wai Boat Harbor. Specifies process for establishing moorage fees. Effective July 1, 2030. (SB1549 HD1)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to WLH, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WLH has scheduled a public hearing on 02-08-11 1:15PM in conference room 225.

(S) The committee(s) on WLH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WLH were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Solomon, Ryan, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Fukunaga, Shimabukuro.
(S) Reported from WLH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 199) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-24-11 9:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kim, Kouchi, Ryan, Tokuda, Wakai, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Kidani.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 705) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-08-11.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 370) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to WLO, FIN, referral sheet 33
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by WLO on Friday, 03-18-11 8:30AM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on WLO recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Chang, Har, Cabanilla, Coffman, Herkes, Ito, Nakashima, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Riviere; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Chong.
(H) Reported from WLO (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1036), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and Cabanilla, Har excused (2).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Tuesday, 04-05-11 2:00PM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Chong, Choy, Cullen, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Marumoto; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Coffman.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1570) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-12-11.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 1 with Representative(s) Hanohano, Marumoto voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Brower voting no (1) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 567).
(S) Senate disagrees with House amendments.
(H) Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 605).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Dela Cruz, Chair; Kouchi, Ige, Co-Chair(s); Galuteria, Solomon, Slom.
(H) House conferees appointed: Chang, Har Co-Chairs; Tokioka, Riviere.
